meanings.definition: The ability to be maintained at a certain rate or level.
meanings.sent1: The sustainability of the small business relied on steady customer support.
meanings.sent2: Environmental sustainability is crucial for the health of our planet.
meanings.sent3: The sustainability of the joke was in how long it made people laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like the sustainability of a renewable resource, never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The sustainability of the old tree in the storm symbolized resilience and strength.

meanings.definition: The quality of not being harmful to the environment or depleting natural resources.
meanings.sent1: We must prioritize sustainability in our farming practices to protect the land.
meanings.sent2: Companies are now focusing on sustainability to reduce their carbon footprint.
meanings.sent3: The sustainability of the new eco-friendly packaging delighted environmentally conscious customers.
meanings.sent4: Her actions spoke of sustainability, leaving no negative impact on nature.
meanings.sent5: The sustainability of the coral reef was a testament to the balance of nature.
